moqui.basic.Enumeration.description: Payment Capture Fail For Order
Order Csv
Return Request
Shipment Item Complete
System sends the notification to an user by the creation of a new user account.

A notification email gets sent after the customer enters valid Email address. The user is instructed to check their email and follow the link to reset their password. The link in the email will bring them to password reset page.
The Order Confirmation Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after they have successfully placed an Order.
The Order Change Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after the status of an Order has been modified. This should include changes to one item or all items within the Order.
System sends the notification to customer to inform that the items they've ordered are on back order and will be shipped as soon as possible.
The Order Cancel Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after the Order has been canceled.
The Order Complete Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after the Order has been successfully fulfilled.
The Order Approved Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer when order approved.

The Shipment Complete Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after the Order has been successfully shipped. The email contains shipment details including the shipment tracking number.
Email sent to customer if its Product return request is accepted .
Email sent to customer if its Product return request is refused.
Email sent to customer when Product Return is complete.
The Contact Us Notification is an email that gets sent to the admin after the customer completes a Contact Us Request in the eCommerce implementation.
System sends the notification to Customer when they request for product return wrt to any order.
Email sent to customer when Product Return is rejected.
Email sent to customer when Product Return is received.
Order Reject Notification
The Order Custom Notification is an email which do not contain any predefined template. The user writes the custom message in this mail.
The Purchase Order Confirmation Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after they have successfully placed a Purchase Order.
The Purchase Quote Approve notification is an email that gets send to the customer when purchase quote is approved.
The Purchase Quote Confirm Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after they have successfully placed a Purchase Quote.
The Purchase Quote Rejected notification is an email that gets send to the customer when purchase quote is rejected
The Quote Request Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after they have successfully placed an Quote.
The Quote Complete Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after the Quote has been successfully completed.
Quote Approve notification is an email that gets send to the customer when quote approved.
Quote Rejected notification is an email that gets send to the customer when quote rejected
Quote Expiration notification is an email that gets send to the customer when quote is expired.
The Digital Item(s) Complete Notification is an email that gets sent to the customer after the Digital Item(s) has been successfully completed.
Email Sent to admin when a person completes the survey
Payment Declined Notification
Party Qualification
Mail To Customer
Pro Application Approve Email
Pro Application Approve Email
System sends the password retrieve email to B2B User when he/she forgot password.
System sends email address verification email to b2b user.
Shipment Delivered
